name: Slayser
description:
A dark forest teeming with the undead is the most dangerous place in the world. Resurrected Skeleton
forced to fight them until the morning, defending his last chance to return
to his native village and the restoration of life.

Kill enemies while surviving endless waves.
Buy new weapons and defenses to improve your survivability.
Survive as many waves as possible and set a record!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Shop with weapons.
